Title: Establishes the native/pollinator planting fund and the pollinator highway program
Summary: Establishes the native/pollinator planting fund and the pollinator highway program with the goal of promoting the cultivation and maintenance of native flowering plants, grasses and shrubs on land bordering state highways and on other public lands.
LawCode: Add ยง99-tt, St Fin L; add ยง67, Hway L
